title: Sealing The Deal
description: Sarah Smith is truly madly and deeply in love with CEO Harry Green. He is the man of her dreams but he doesn't believe in love. And he doesn't seem to have gotten over his ex Angelica either.When Harry hired Sarah to be his pretend girlfriend, she thought everything would go smoothly but now she thinks its the biggest mistake of her life. Because while she is falling for Harry, he isn't falling for her.So Sarah's best friend Jane creates a plan for Sarah to catch Harry and make him fall in love with her. But the best laid plans never seem to work, do they
author: Helen    Cooper
